page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: In our school area there are 3 working mens' clubs, a snooker and bingo club, 4 public houses and a wine bar. In the Welcome Club, in Victoria Road, there is a very plush bar, plus snooker tables and dart boards. Often, at weekends,there is a cabaret. In the Regent Leisure Centre, Corringham Road, there are 14 snooker tables, a bar and restaurant and a Bingo Hall. The Youth Club has hot and cold snacks, soft drinks, snooker and pool tables, dart boards, table tennis, a television and regular discos. The majority of pupils questioned said they believed the entertainment in Stanford is not very good and that there is much room for improvement.
